NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
NAEB TAPE NETWORK
Series 51 - 6 - "The New World of Atomic Energy‚Äù
To; NAEB Tape Network Headquarters
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois, Urbana, Illihois
This station plans to make copies of the WLS series,
"The New World of Atomic Energy" for broadcast to elementary
and/or secondary schools. In so doing I understand that the
clearance granted to the NAEB for the use of this series by
the American Federation of Radio Artists places certain
limitations on its use.
This station agrees to use its copies of this series
for regular school broadcasting only, during the school year
1951-52, At the conclusion of such use, the tapes will be
erased, I understand that the cle ranee granted by AFRA does
NOT permit us to keep permanent copies of this series.
Station Station manager or
program director
Institution
Date
Location
